title: Page not loading properly
description: When trying to access the homepage, the page does not load completely. Only the header and footer are visible.

title: Unable to reset password
description: Clicked on the 'Forgot Password' link but did not receive the reset password email.

title: Error 404 when accessing profile page
description: Every time I try to access my profile page, I encounter a 404 error page.

title: Incorrect billing amount
description: Received the latest bill which shows an incorrect amount. It's higher than expected.

title: Product page images not loading
description: Images on the product page are not loading, only placeholder icons are visible.

title: Unable to add items to cart
description: Clicked on 'Add to Cart' button but nothing happens. Cart remains empty.

title: Login button not working
description: Clicking on the 'Login' button does nothing. Unable to access my account.

title: Error message when submitting form
description: After filling out the form and hitting submit, an error message appears but it's not clear what the issue is.

title: Slow loading times
description: Overall website performance is slow. Pages take a long time to load.

title: Incorrect order confirmation email
description: Received an order confirmation email for a purchase I didn't make. The details are incorrect.

title: Broken links on FAQ page
description: Several links on the FAQ page lead to 404 error pages.

title: Mobile app crashes upon launch
description: Every time I try to open the mobile app, it crashes immediately.

title: Unable to change profile picture
description: Clicked on the 'Change Picture' button but nothing happens.

title: Missing tracking information for order
description: Ordered a product but did not receive any tracking information. Unable to track the shipment.

title: Cannot access support page
description: When I click on the 'Support' link, it redirects to an error page.

title: Search function returning no results
description: Using the search bar returns no results, even for common keywords.

title: Incorrect information on product page
description: The specifications listed on the product page are inaccurate.

title: Order not delivered
description: Placed an order but it hasn't been delivered yet. It's past the expected delivery date.

title: Password change not saving
description: Changed my password but the new password is not being saved. Unable to log in.

title: Payment not processing
description: Tried to make a payment but it keeps getting declined.

title: Invalid coupon code
description: Entered a coupon code at checkout but it's being flagged as invalid.

title: Cannot unsubscribe from emails
description: Clicked on the unsubscribe link in the email but it redirects to an error page.

title: Incorrect order received
description: Received a different item from what I ordered.

title: Error message when updating profile info
description: Trying to update my profile information results in an error message.

title: Missing buttons on mobile site
description: Certain buttons are missing when accessing the website on a mobile device.

title: Issue with checkout process
description: Encountering errors during the checkout process. Unable to complete the purchase.

title: Unable to download file from account
description: Clicked on the download button but the file is not downloading.

title: Incorrect balance shown in account
description: The balance shown in my account is different from what it should be.

title: Unable to update shipping address
description: Trying to update the shipping address but the changes are not saving.

title: Email notifications not being received
description: Not receiving any email notifications from the website even though notifications are enabled.

title: Unable to access certain pages
description: Getting a '403 Forbidden' error when trying to access certain pages on the website.

title: Difficulty accessing account on new device
description: Tried to log in to my account from a new device but encountered issues.

title: Product out of stock despite availability
description: Tried to purchase a product listed as available but it's showing as out of stock during checkout.

title: Unable to reach customer support
description: Tried calling customer support but couldn't get through. Also no response to emails.

title: Incorrect date displayed on order
description: Received an order confirmation with the wrong date.

title: Cannot update payment method
description: Trying to update my payment method but the changes are not saving.

title: Issues with image upload
description: Trying to upload an image but it's not working. No error message displayed.

title: Unable to access account settings
description: Clicking on the 'Account Settings' link does nothing.

title: Incorrect tax calculation at checkout
description: Tax applied at checkout is higher than it should be based on my location.

title: Item missing from order
description: Received my order but one of the items is missing.

title: No response after submitting contact form
description: Filled out the contact form but haven't received any response.

title: Unable to cancel subscription
description: Clicked on the 'Cancel Subscription' button but nothing happens.

title: Unable to add payment method
description: Clicked on the 'Add Payment Method' button but nothing happens.

title: Duplicate charges on credit card
description: Checked my credit card statement and noticed duplicate charges from the website.

title: Cannot change account password
description: Tried to change my account password but the changes are not saving.

title: Issue with account verification
description: Trying to verify my account but not receiving the verification email.

title: Unable to access order history
description: Clicking on 'Order History' leads to a blank page.

title: Unable to reach certain sections of website
description: When navigating to certain sections, the page keeps loading indefinitely.

title: Difficulty navigating website on mobile
description: Encountering issues with navigation while using the website on a mobile device.

title: Issue with website layout on Firefox browser
description: The website layout is broken when viewed on Firefox browser.
